Installation of the recogbase-Package recogbase
To install this package just extract the package's archive file to the GAP pkg directory.
By default the recogbase package is not automatically loaded by &GAP; when it is installed. You must load the package with LoadPackage("recogbase"); before its functions become available.
Usually, this package is only usable if you also install the recog package containing all the implemented recognition methods. Since the recog package then automatically loads the recogbase one only has to load both packages with LoadPackage("recog");.
